title: Monster Farm: Legend e no Michi (Monster Rancher (2000))
synopsis: Genki is a boy who loves playing video games. One day he's zapped into the world of Monster Rancher and meets the girl Holly and the monsters Mochi, Suezo, Golem, Tiger and Hare.
voices: ['Yao, Kazuki', 'Yokoyama, Chisa', 'Takagi, Wataru', 'Shiratori, Yuri', 'Kouda, Mariko', 'Uchida, Naoya', 'Sasaki, Nozomu', 'Nakamura, Daiki', 'Naitou, Ryou']
staff: [['Yano, Hiroyuki', ['Director']], ['Kuriyama, Yoshihide', ['Episode Director']], ['Ishida, Tooru', ['Episode Director']], ['Komura, Toshiaki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
